articles.description: Marcus Smith is set to start at full-back and Fin Smith at fly-half for England in Saturday's Six Nations match with France at Allianz Stadium.
articles.title: Fin Smith set to start at fly-half for England against France in Six Nations

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is celebrating his 40th birthday and showing no sign of stopping any time soon.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: 'No impossibilities' as Portugal forward turns 40

articles.description: Joe Root will play his first one-day international since the 2023 World Cup in the opening match of England's series against India on Thursday in Nagpur.
articles.title: England in India: Joe Root returns for first ODI since 2023 World Cup

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says right-back Trent Alexander-Arnold will miss the second leg of their Carabao Cup semi-final against Tottenham on Thursday because of an injury.
articles.title: Carabao Cup: Trent Alexander-Arnold to miss semi-final second leg against Tottenham

articles.description: How France tapped into Paris' latent rugby talent, fighting in football's stronghold to change the face of a sport and a team.
articles.title: Rugby union in France: How Massy changed the game in Paris

articles.description: Donald Trump will become the first sitting US president to attend the Super Bowl.
articles.title: Super Bowl: Donald Trump to make history as first sitting president to attend NFL showpiece

articles.description: Taylor Swift will be supporting her boyfriend Travis Kelce at the Super Bowl in New Orleans, but a previous trip to the Big Easy almost ended his career before it began.
articles.title: Super Bowl: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift - an NFL love story that almost never was

articles.description: Eddie Hearn says Anthony Joshua has not started talks with any potential opponent for his next fight.
articles.title: ;Anthony Joshua: Eddie Hearn denies Deontay Wilder or Martin Bakole fights agreed

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo turns 40 on 5 February, but which other players have still been going strong after passing that milestone?
articles.title: Ronaldo, Maldini, Buffon, Ibrahimovic, Giggs: Football's best 40-year-olds

articles.description: LeBron James says it will be "special" to play alongside Luka Doncic at the LA Lakers following the Slovenian's trade from the Dallas Mavericks.
articles.title: LeBron James excited by 'special' Luka Doncic link up at LA Lakers
